node.comment: Parallelize batch jobs, track per-file status, and support resumable queues.

node.title: Scope
node.comment: - N-concurrency based on cores. - Persistent queue with retry/backoff. - Per-file ETA and error messages.

node.title: UX
node.comment: - Batch dashboard with progress bars. - Retry failed items individually. - Save/restore batch sessions.

node.title: Acceptance Criteria
node.comment: - Resume after crash without data loss. - 20%+ throughput vs sequential. - No global abort on single failure.
